mapper.select: SELECT b.id, b.title, b.inserted, m.Member_NickName writerNickName, COUNT(r.id) numOfReply FROM Board b LEFT JOIN Reply r ON b.id = r.board_id LEFT JOIN Member m ON b.member_id = m.Member_ID GROUP BY b.id ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT b.id, b.title, b.body, b.inserted, b.member_id memberId, COUNT(DISTINCT r.id) numOfReply, m.Member_NickName writerNickName, COUNT(f.id) hasFile FROM Board b LEFT JOIN Reply r ON b.id = r.board_id LEFT JOIN Member m ON b.member_id = m.Member_ID LEFT JOIN File f ON b.id = f.board_id WHERE b.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Board(title, body, member_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{body}, #{memberId})
